definitions.title: n.m.
definitions.body: :Is 11:6 leopard;—abs. ´[[נ]] Ho 13:7 + 3 t.; pl. [[נְמֵרִים]] Hb Hab 1:8, Ct So 4:8; —leopard, as spotted Je 13:23, swift Hb Hab 1:8, keen-eyed Je 5:6 (symb. of calamities of Isr.), so Ho 13:7 (sim. of ´[[י]]); [[עִם־גְּדִי יִרְבָָּץ]] ´[[נ]] Is 11:6 (predict); [[חַרֲרֵי]] [[נְמֵרִים]] Ct So 4:8 (‖[[מְעׂנוֹת אֲרָיוֹת]]).
